<p>
AUGUSTA, June 17, <a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?year=1830">1830</a>;. 
</p><p>
SIR: <a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=anj" rel="colleague met">Gen Jackson</a> having sent to you a copy of his letter to me of the 
8th instant, it is proper that you should see the answer to it; you will find a 
copy on the opposite page. 
</p><p>
I am, Sir, with respect, 
</p><p>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=jof" rel="me">JOHN FORSYTH</a>, 
</p><p>
Hon. <a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=jcc" rel="colleague met">JOHN C. CALHOUN</a>. 
</p>
